Name: Galaxy X
About the game: Embark on an epic journey in this hardcore Multiplayer RPG! As a Galactic Cadet, you and your Combat Squad of friends must brave hostile worlds in search of valuable loot and resources. Craft powerful gear, slay otherworldly creatures, and save the galaxy. 1. Operation instructions ① '←→' controls the movement of the tank ② '↑↓' to adjust the shooting Angle ③ 'As' weapon switch ④ '123456' used items ⑤ Space key launch 2. How to get started When the game is loaded, click on Game Start to start the game. 3. Game objectives Operate properly and defeat your opponent.
